snippet.title: Become a Villain - Official Sea of Thieves Season 13 Trailer - Xbox Games Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Seize Flameheart's powerful flagship and become the boss fight with an all-new type of World Event arriving in Sea of Thieves Season 13! Rain fire on your foes with a skeleton crew at your command as you fend off rival crews, seek Tribute and reap the rewards of your dastardly deeds. Season 13 update coming July 25. Learn more: https://www.seaofthieves.com/

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/sea-of-thieves-2024-edition/9P2N57MC619K/0010

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR
